relproducts.title: Country Meadow Natural - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: As you immerse yourself in the quaint and calm stylings of country meadow natural you come to realise just how much there is to see and explore. The subtle infusion of colour allows you to feel at ease and at peace the moment you walk through the door. The finishing piece to your new homely little bolthole. If you want to add the perfect blend of contemporary style meets country chic, why not use natural in the kitchen? It has everything you need to make the heart of the home the space you never want to leave.

relproducts.title: Country Meadow Dusk - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: When you take a look at country meadow dusk you're instantly transported to a calmer place. The gently textured fabric sits elegantly in the background, serving as the perfect foundation on which to display a true symphony of colours. The great thing about dusk is that it allows you to take your decor in a variety of new and exciting directions. We love the idea of using it on the upstairs landing to add that homely touch to one of the more difficult to perfect spaces.

relproducts.title: Country Meadow Fresh - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: If you look closely at their new country meadow fresh fabric you come to appreciate the artisan skill that goes into intricately layering the colours. They seem to ebb and flow, this way and that, giving the fabric a life of its own as they do so. Matching to meadow fresh is all about being flexible with the other colours you introduce. A neutral beige is the ideal colour for the new living room carpet, whilst a light mint feature wall would also make for an inspiring finishing touch.
